course_title: Fresh Sem: Africn Amer Studies: Af. Am. Studies Sexuality
class_notes:
(Freshmen Seminar - Limited to First Year Students Only)
This course is a discussion based seminar surveying sexuality and gender across the African Diaspora. We will explore anthropological texts, memoir, art, and film with a focus on black feminist and queer critique. Students will gain an understanding of how race, sex, and gender are socially constructed yet impact people's lived experience in relationship to their historical and global context.
course_description: Variable topics in African American Studies.
schedule_location: TTh 2:30pm-3:45pm in New Psyc Bldg 250 (36 Eagle Ro
